meanings.sent1: The curious askers in the classroom raised their hands eagerly.
meanings.sent2: The askers at the town hall meeting wanted to know more about the new policy.
meanings.sent3: The little askers at the zoo wondered why the giraffe had such a long neck.
meanings.sent4: The askers in the group discussion were like detectives seeking answers.
meanings.sent5: The askers in the library were like hungry minds searching for knowledge.

meanings.definition: Those who inquire or request information.
meanings.sent1: The helpful askers at the information desk guided tourists to the nearest attractions.
meanings.sent2: The curious askers in the audience wanted to know more about the scientific discovery.
meanings.sent3: The young askers at the party were eager to find out the secret behind the magician's tricks.
meanings.sent4: The askers in the interview room were like puzzle solvers piecing together information.
meanings.sent5: The askers in the group chat were like detectives uncovering hidden details.
